ingredients: 2 chipotle chilies in adobo, plus 1 tsp. adobo sauce
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
4 corn tortillas, each 6 inches in diameter, cut into 1/4-inch strips
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
1/2 butternut squash, about 1 lb., peeled, seeded, cut into 1/2-inch dice and roasted until tender
1 can (14 1/2 oz.) black beans, drained and rinsed
1 green onion, green portion only, thinly sliced on the diagonal
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
1/4 lb. jicama, peeled and cut into matchsticks
Thinly sliced red onion for garnish
